pageContext.claim: “Small-business optimism has reached an all-time high. It's the highest it's ever been recorded.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is citing a survey by the National Federation of Independent Business, a conservative group. The survey was mailed to a sample of 5,000 members or small businesses, and from that pool, the NFIB got 562 "usable responses." The response rate was a relatively low 11 percent and it's not clear that this survey gives a full picture of small business optimism.
